sourcesContent: function getDate(hours) { const currentDate = new Date(); const currentYear = currentDate.getFullYear(); const currentMonth = currentDate.getMonth(); const currentDay = currentDate.getDate(); const timeStamp = new Date( currentYear, currentMonth, currentDay, 0, 0, 0 ).getTime(); return new Date(timeStamp + hours * 60 * 60 * 1000).getTime(); } const staks = [ { id: 1, label: "第一个里程碑",//标题 status: '进行中', //状态 start: 1686240000000, //开始时间 endTime: 1687536000000, //结束时间 duration: 15 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000, percent: 85, type: "project", //collapsed: true, }, { id: 2, label: "第一个子节点", status: '进行中', parentId: 1, //对应的父节点 start: getDate(-24 * 4), duration: 4 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000, percent: 50, type: "milestone", collapsed: false, //是否自动收缩 style: { //颜色 base: { fill: "#1EBC61", //进度颜色 stroke: "#0EAC51" } } }, { id: 3, label: "第一个孙节点", status: 'John Wayne', parentId: 2, start: 1686240000000, endTime: 1687536000000, duration: 2 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000, percent: 100, type: "task" }, { id: 4, label: "第二个里程碑", status: 'Clark Kent', start: getDate(-24 * 2), duration: 2 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000, percent: 50, type: "task", dependentOn: [3] }, { id: 5, label: "第三个里程碑", status: 'Clark Kent', start: getDate(-24 * 2), duration: 2 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000, percent: 50, type: "task", dependentOn: [3] }, { id: 6, label: "第四个里程碑", status: 'Clark Kent', start: getDate(-24 * 2), duration: 2 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000, percent: 50, type: "task", dependentOn: [3] }, ] export default staks
